Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-4854 affecting package wireshark for versions less than 4.4.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-4854 affecting package wireshark for versions less than 4.4.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package wireshark is earlier than 4.4.7-1, affected by CVE-2024-4854
